# GitHub Configuration

GitHub-specific configuration including issue templates, pull request templates, and the AI agent ecosystem.

## Contents

| Path | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` | Standard PR template with checklist |
| `ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` | Issue templates for bugs, features, docs, and questions |
| `agents/` | AI agent ecosystem for automated development tasks |

## Overview

This directory contains GitHub-specific files that enhance the development workflow. Issue and PR templates ensure contributors provide necessary information, while the agents directory contains the multi-agent AI development pipeline.

## Agent Ecosystem

The `agents/` directory contains a comprehensive multi-agent development pipeline with specialized agents for research, planning, implementation, and validation. See the agents directory for full documentation.

## Related

- [`agents/`](agents/) - AI agent ecosystem documentation
- [`ISSUE_TEMPLATE/`](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/) - Issue templates for reporting and requesting
